binding.script: var exportdir = getprop("/sim/fg-home")~"/Export";changedtc = gui.FileSelector.new(callback: DTC.loadcart,title: "Select a Data Cartridge (.raptordtc)",button: "Load DTC",dir: exportdir,dotfiles: 1,pattern: ["*.raptordtc"]);changedtc.open();
